Audio.Locality: Serra dos Orgaos National Park. Teresopolis
Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Pedra do Sino trail. Montane forest. Almost certainly the same birds recorded in #2. This is Call C in our DVD-ROM 'Birds of Brazil'.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Pyrrhura frontalis,Dysithamnus xanthopterus,Tijuca atra,Hylophilus poicilotis,Saltator similis
